name: Ray Odierno
description: About me??? I am good person with a lot of love to give to the right person. I am caring and faithful. Raising my child has been my priority for many years, she is now of an age that I can have my own life. I tend to be shy at first but warm up quickly. I love to laugh, and have fun.I am very comfortable in my life, i am not looking for anyone to take care of me. I am looking for someone to share life’s ups and downs with. Someone who is honest and is not afraid to laugh at herself.Everyday is a gift, we need to take a few minutes everyday and be thankful for those around us.
